context/2: When a man or woman walks out alone these days, does nothing less than take his life in his hands, and that's the truth.
context/3: Things have come to a pretty pass and no mistake.
context/5: Here we are, Sir.
context/7: Look into cupboards and behind curtains.
context/8: Pull them out of bed if need be.
